snippet: The bank puffed up its second quarter results by transferring $1.4 billion of its allowance for loan losses out of the chief investment office and into the investment bank, Floyd Norris reported for The New York Times Economix blog. Read more »
abstract: The bank puffed up its second quarter results by transferring $1.4 billion of its allowance for loan losses out of the chief investment office and into the investment bank, Floyd Norris reported for The New York Times Economix blog. Read more »

headline.main: JPMorgan Discovers Good News in Housing
